since the publication of letters to a
dying friend
much progress has been made in the study
of the near-death experience
and although definite proof of life
after death is still lacking
an impressive body of data has been
compiled as the
number of researchers in this field
continues to grow
dr raymond moody's new book the light
beyond
continues the work he began with his
book life after life in 1976
since this time dr moody has compiled
more than a thousand new case studies of
people who
experienced clinical death and survived
he also reports on the work of other
researchers one such person is dr
michael grosso a philosopher
whose work suggests a strong link
between the near-death experience and
the teachings of the great philosophers
from plato to christ
dr moody also reports on some of the
more transcendental
aspects of the nde
people who have experienced this report
that at the moment of their death
they are completely themselves no longer
just their
wife's husband or their child's parent
they're just themselves an interesting
